website_summaries.verdict: Providing the highest levels of low-key convenience and wearer confidence, these compact applicator tampons are worth paying a little extra for.
pros: Boasts a perfectly discreet pocket-sized applicator that easily extends and clicks into place prior to use
Smooth, tapered tip allows for comfortable insertion
A design that expands evenly for the best levels of protection and comfort
Compact applicator makes for easier disposal
Multipack is perfect for both moderate and heavy flow days
cons: First time users may need to get familiarized with the telescopic applicator

customer_reviews.title: I love that these are smaller for fitting in your pocket
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are smaller for fitting in your pocket, purse, wallet, or medicine cabinet, but then they still pop open to be regular sized after opening. Additionally, it is really helpful to have regulars and supers in the same box for transitioning from the beginning of the period to the end. This is a great value, and I will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: thegirlyonfire

customer_reviews.title: Less space = more convenience
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and compact when you don't have a lot of extra room in your purse. Easy to stick in your pocket on your way to the lady's room.... Practical choice for product that works.
customer_reviews.author: TRiffic

customer_reviews.title: I love these tampons
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons. They're really compact and work great. The only thing I don't like is that all of the individual wrappers are different colors, so it's not easy to tell which are the Super and which are the Regular.
customer_reviews.author: BooBooBritches

customer_reviews.title: The actual worst
customer_reviews.text: The applicator is useless, it doesn't push the tampon far enough so it comes right back with the plastic. Also seems quite prone to leakage
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous user

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price and love the compact too
customer_reviews.text: Always keep these on hand. Great product and price and love the compact too.
customer_reviews.author: Smithjss50

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as regular Kotex kind
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size but not enough absorption compared to the regular Kotex Regulars and Super sizes.
customer_reviews.author: M Neal

customer_reviews.title: Love how compact these are
customer_reviews.text: Love how compact these are. Not the brand I usually use but so far I have no complaints. Not uncomfortable like some can be.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Click and push not pull
customer_reviews.text: Don't like click and pull. Hard to pull because of compact size.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion 🌼

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product made me feel better about buying Tampons. Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Preston

customer_reviews.title: They're all gone...
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend used them all, so they must have been pretty great. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Drives me insane that they're not color-coded. The clicking mechanism is awkward and doesn't seem to really work half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: These are the most uncomfortable thing to use. There ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the most uncomfortable thing to use. There isn’t enough stick to push the tampon in all the way? BIG DESIGN FLAW!
customer_reviews.author: The Fox

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cute packaging
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about the design but like the concept of a compact tampon. It's harder to use than the traditional kotex style that is more bulky. It's cute, fun and more discrete! I prefer the older style and will continue to hide them in my purse. If placed properly you can't tell they are there like the other design but they don't go in as far. To be fair... it depends on what you are looking for... compact/cute or more functional/better comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable easy to use and are great for the job
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable easy to use and are great for the job. Have no complaints. Will use these over any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with how customer service reacted and they said they ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife decided to try this brand for the first time... HUGE MISTAKE! The tampon started ripping apart when she went to remove it! She had to go to the OBGYN just to make sure nothing was left! My wife called the manufacturer and they immediately transfered her to a manager who apologized profusely and wanted to let her know this is rare. They sent her a visa gift card to cover the cost of the box of tampons and did tell her that if she had any medical expenses they would gladly pay them. I was pleased with how customer service reacted and they said they were launching an investigation into it. I just wouldn't buy them ever again!
customer_reviews.author: Matt & Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good absorption, great quality
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason these are one of the only brands of tampons I can use without developing a reaction to them. Being a female can have very uncomfortable moments. I like the variety pack, great for regular flow days and also great for the lighter days. Good absorption and easy to use. I purchased this item as part of my Prime pantry order. I paid full price and I was not compensated in any way for my thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they're compact. However there is a trade off in that the tampon itself is very small. I'm not too sure they will handle a regular flow. It seems like these may be made for girls just starting their period whose flow isn't all that heavy yet.
customer_reviews.author: JIMLA

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want to ruin your clothes
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for the first time last week. The absorbancy isn't as good as other brands and it leaks. The super size still overflowed and there was considerable leakage even after it being in for about an hour. I switched back to my usual brand and had no issue. Would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Applicators work only 50% of the time.
customer_reviews.text: Half of the applicators don't work because it only pushes the cotton a quarter of the way out. This was my first time trying tampons and it's clear I'll never buy kotex again since half the box is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tamps EVER
customer_reviews.text: These are my all time favorite!! I've been using these for 5-6 years and if I ever use anything else they leak, are uncomfortable, ect,ect. These stay in place, hardly EVER leak ( I have a few heavy days ) and the colorful packaging is always fun haha
customer_reviews.author: Mellisa Ann Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the new compact design.
customer_reviews.text: Not so fond of the new compact design. Totally missing the old design. Going to be looking for a new tampon now. Have always used Kotex for over 3 decades. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: lizardqueen

customer_reviews.title: they are good tampons.
customer_reviews.text: nothing really to say about it, they are good tampons.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Suggestion, but great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these products and have been using them for years. Kimberly-Clark, any thoughts on a 'Super-Plus/Regular' combo pack? My uterus basically laughs at my attempts for a normal life for the first two days which keeps me from buying these handy dandy combos.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Iannella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: IF you have to use one... use these. I have used this product my whole period life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye blood
customer_reviews.text: Started using it, I bleed more on my periods most of the time its not absorbent enough. Got to say works better then my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tampons
customer_reviews.text: I love these tampons! They work great & are small enough to fit in a pocket easily!
customer_reviews.author: trin miele

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work well and are easy to keep on hand
customer_reviews.author: CC

product_meta.title: U by Kotex Click Compact Tampons, Multipack, Regular/Super Absorbency, 34 Count
product_meta.description:
Get full-sized period protection with a comfortable compact tampon! U by Kotex Click Multipack Tampons (regular and super) allow you to discreetly carry in your purse or pocket. Small in size but big on protection, these tampons go from compact to a full-size tampon in one easy step. Pull the lower half of the tampon until you hear it lock and then insert. Click Tampons are designed with a smooth tip for comfortable, quick and easy insertion. The tampon expands so you’re fully covered to help stop leaks. These regular and super absorbency unscented tampons are not made with natural rubber latex and have no fragrance added. Each box contains 17 regular tampons and 17 super tampons. Need additional coverage? Use U by Kotex Barely There Liners for backup protection.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Dimensions :3 x 5.19 x 3.82 inches; 6.4 Ounces
 * Item model number :10036000426639
 * Date First Available :October 25, 2017
 * Manufacturer :Kimberly-Clark Corp
 * ASIN :B018JQKIAI

 * 

 * Customer Reviews:4.7 out of 5 stars133 ratings Get full-sized period protection with a comfortable compact tampon! U by Kotex Click Multipack Tampons (regular and super) allow you to discreetly carry in your purse or pocket. Small in size but big on protection, these tampons go from compact to a full-size tampon in one easy step. Pull the lower half of the tampon until you hear it lock and then insert. Click Tampons are designed with a smooth tip for comfortable, quick and easy insertion. The tampon expands so you’re fully covered to help stop leaks. These regular and super absorbency unscented tampons are not made with natural rubber latex and have no fragrance added. Each box contains 17 regular tampons and 17 super tampons. Need additional coverage? Use U by Kotex Barely There Liners for backup protection.
feature_bullets: U by Kotex Click Regular & Super Tampons capture and absorb fluid for powerful period protection in every direction
Designed for comfort, CLICK tampons have a smooth tip for quick, easy and comfortable insertion
Unscented tampon expands and moves with you for full coverage, helping to prevent leaks
Small and compact to discreetly carry in your purse or pocket; transforms into full-sized tampon in one easy step
34 compact tampons per box - 17 regular absorbency and 17 super absorbency
Individually wrapped feminine product, ships directly to your door; Packaging may vary from image shown
